TopicTitle: Is it safe to hand-edit a Kerbal's trait/job?

Articles.Content:
I've got a Galileo's Planet pack modset running, and I'm *only* getting offered pilots. Will it destroy the game if I go to persistent.sfs and edit non-starter kerbals I've hired to have 

trait = Scientist

?

Will this break anything? Do I need to edit anything else?

Make a backup just in case, but it shouldn't harm anything.   And the persistent.sfs should be the only file you need to edit.   I regularly personalize my kerbals when I start a new career with no ill effects.
